articles.title: Titanic sub search: US Navy detected implosion sounds after sub lost contact - BBC
articles.description: The US Coast Guard are said to have used the information to narrow the search area.
articles.content:
The US Navy detected sounds "consistent with an implosion" shortly after OceanGate's Titan submersible lost contact, a navy official has said.
Five people were aboard the vessel when it went missing… [+2416 chars]
